name: Boogie's Mini Markets
about: A conversion-focused website and brand system designed and built for my AI-integrated mini market business in Atlanta. Developed with a mobile-first, component-based approach, this project includes animated promotional components, lead capture flows, and UX decisions informed by real operational needs, bridging digital design with a physical product experience.

name: Drink 4 The Kids 2025
about: A mobile-first web app and POS system built for the 5th annual D4K charity party. We raised over $33,000 supporting The Nicholas House and True Change charities in Atlanta. With 200+ unique users, 500+ orders placed, and 700+ drinks made, we continue improving the system each year to enhance the event’s success.

name: LeagueTrendz
about: An NBA application providing users with a comprehensive platform to explore stats, team performances, and follow their favorite players and teams with accurate data up to the 2023-24 season.

name: SwoleMates v2
about: A much-needed revamping of my first project — a Facebook-inspired fitness social media platform for weightlifters that enables users to keep up with their fitness progress, create posts and workouts, and interact with their friends’ content.

name: SwoleMates
about: A social media app for fitness enthusiasts. Users can create posts and workouts, add friends, and like/comment on their friends' content.

name: GetFit
about: A web app for fitness enthusiasts to track their main lifts and create custom workout routines.

name: Job Tracker
about: A responsive web app designed for users to easily keep track of any job they apply to during their search.

name: Quizard
about: A Quizlet clone, designed for users to create their own quizzes to fit their studying needs.
